title: leaver busted
body: I got LB at start of game cause i typed brb at the 145 min mark... i was back within 1 min. nOw i have 10 min leaver buster, cause my adc fed 3 kills in less than 4 in of game... this isnt right... i first leaver buster a couple of days before was because someone didnt get their champ and stopped playing during gaem and i got reported along with him.. Pls fix this!

replies.body:
Id appreciate some help but its not from my end.  I never have any other difficulties in any other games i play. or whenever im online.   

Thanks for the reply

I took a look at your account and it seems you're getting flagged by the /Remake system. This system flags any player who is *inactive* for 90 seconds or longer within the first 3 minutes of the match. If anyone has been flagged, a remake becomes available at 3:00 and requires 30% of the team to pass. If the vote passes, the match ends and those marked by the system will receive a loss penalty and it can trigger leaverbuster if you've had a trend of disconnections. Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for additional information on this system.

While I cannot modify or remove these penalties, I can assist you in troubleshooting a technical issue if one is causing your disconnections.
